content: {"name": "Interchurch Social Service of Knox Co.", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Serving residents of Mount Vernon City School district\nCLOSED ON FIRST AND THIRD THURSDAY ", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "306 West Gambier Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Mount Vernon", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43050", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.3917142, "longitude": -82.489616}, "phones": [{"number": "(740) 397-4825", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "15:30"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Photo ID and proof of address is required for adults 18+"}]}
